cards.name: Abraxan
cards.flavorText: ‘... winged horses, all palominos, and each the size of an elephant.’
effect: When you play this card, do 5 damage to an opponent and you may return a non-Healing Item card from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Alastor Moody
cards.flavorText: ‘“He was an Auror — one of the best ... a Dark wizard catcher. Half the cells in Azkaban are full because of him.”’ — Charlie Weasley
effect: Before each of your turns, you may take 4 damage. If you do, you may play a Spell with printed Power cost of 4 or less without using any Actions. That card requires 3 less Power to play. (You still need at least 1 Power that matches.)

cards.name: Bill Weasley
cards.flavorText: ‘Bill’s clothes would not have looked out of place at a rock concert, except Harry recognized his boots to be made, not of leather, but of dragon hide.’
effect: Once per game, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Bumphing
cards.flavorText: Play now reached a level of ferocity beyond anything they had yet seen. The Beaters on both sides were acting without mercy...."
effect: Do 3 damage to an opponent for each Q Item you have in play.

cards.name: Constant Vigilance
cards.flavorText: "CONSTANT VIGILANCE" — Alastor Moody
effect: Once per turn, when you take damage, you may put 1 of the discarded cards from your discard pile into your hand?

cards.name: Disciplinary Transfiguration
effect: If you have 4 or more Lessons in play, when you play this card, you get 1 more Action this turn.
When you play this card, name a Character. Your opponent's cards that share Uniqueness with the named card lose all abilities while this card is in play.
to solve: Your opponent chooses 6 cards in their hand and discards them.
reward: You choose 3 cards in your hand and discard them.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 6 cards in their hand and discards them.
cards.reward: You choose 3 cards in your hand and discard them.

cards.name: Fleur Delacour
effect: Once per turn, you may use an Action to reveal a card in your hand that shares a keyword (except Unique) with at least 10 of your cards in play and/or your discard pile. You may play it without using any Actions and ignoring Power costs. (You still need at least 1 Power that matches.)

cards.name: Gabrielle Delacour
cards.flavorText: ‘There was also a girl who looked no older than eight, whose clouds of silvery hair made Harry feel sure that she was Fleur Delacour’s sister.’
effect: Once per turn, you may use an Action to discard a Spell card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Goblet of Fire
effect: When you play this card, search your deck. You may put up to 3 Characters from your deck into play. Then shuffle your deck.  At the end of each of your turns, discard 1 of your Characters from play.

cards.name: Hermione, S.P.E.W. Founder
cards.flavorText: ‘“Elf enslavement goes back centuries. I can’t believe no one’s done anything about it before now.”’ — Hermione Granger
effect: If Hermione, S.P.E.W. Founder is your starting Character, before drawing your starting hand, you may search your deck for a non-Wizard or Witch Character card and put it into play.

cards.name: Igor Karkaroff
cards.flavorText: ‘... he was tall and thin like Dumbledore, but his white hair was short, and his goatee (finishing in a small curl) did not entirely hide his weak chin.’
effect: The first time you take damage each turn, you take 3 less damage.

cards.name: Imperius Curse
cards.flavorText: ‘“Total control,” said Moody quietly as the spider balled itself up and began to roll over and over.’
effect: When you play this card, choose an opponent's Character in play (except their starter Character) and take control of it while this card is in play.

cards.name: Lee's Tarantula
effect: When this card is put into your discard pile from anywhere, put a Spider not named Lee's Tarantula from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Living Room Explosion
cards.flavorText: ‘The electric fire shot across the room as the boarded-up fireplace burst outward ...’
effect: Return all Items, Events, and Locations from play to their owner's hands

cards.name: Love Potion
effect: Prevent all damage done to you.  Before your turn, discard this card from play.

cards.name: Madame Olympe Maxine
effect: The first time you play a Spell that does no damage during each of your turns, do 3 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Melted Cauldron
effect: Your opponent chooses 1 of their Items or Events in play and discards it. Then they take damage equal to that card's printed Power cost. You may discard 1 of your [P] Lessons from play to repeat this effect.

cards.name: Pensieve
effect: You may use an Action to put any number of cards from your hand under this card facedown. If you do, draw that many cards. You may play cards under this card as if they were in your hand.

cards.name: Perfumed Fire
cards.flavorText: ‘He sat up straight; he had been almost dozing off, lost in the heat and his thoughts.’
effect: Each player chooses 3 of their non-Healing cards in play and puts them on top of their owner's deck in any order. (If they have less than 3 cards in play, they put all of them on the top of their deck.)

cards.name: Poliakoff
cards.flavorText: ‘“I notice you have dribbled food all the way down the front of your robes again, disgusting boy —”’ — Professor Igor Karkaroff
effect: Whenever your opponent plays a Creature, you may do 1 damage to it.

cards.name: Rita Skeeter
cards.flavorText: ‘Attractive blonde Rita Skeeter, forty-three, whose savage quill has punctured many inflated reputations —’ — Rita Skeeter
effect: Once per turn, you may use an Action to count the number of your other Unique cards in play. Do that much damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Rita's Surveillance
effect: Choose an opponent's Character in play with a "Once per game" or "Once per turn" ability (even if that ability is already used). Use that ability without using any Actions.

cards.name: Unicorn Foals
effect: Reveal the card you draw during your draw step. If it is a Lesson card, you get 1 more Action this turn.

cards.name: Weasley's Grandfather Clock
effect: This card needs 2 less Power to play for each of your Weasley cards in play.  Before each of your turns, you may look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may put 1 of them into your hand, then shuffle the rest into your deck.

cards.name: Weatherby
cards.flavorText: ‘“I’ve left young Weatherby in charge ... Very enthusiastic ... a little 	overenthusiastic, if truth be told ...”’ — Bartemius Crouch, Sr.
effect: Once during each of your turns, you may play a card beginning with the same letter as a card an opponent played last turn without using any Actions.

cards.name: Wiggenweld Potion
effect: You may use an Action and discard this card from play to shuffle up to 13 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: World Cup Tickets
effect: Play this card only if there is not a Match in play.  Search your deck. You may take a Quidditch Match from your deck and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: A Guide to Advanced Transfiguration
effect: Before your turn, you may dicard this card from play. If you do, choose an opponent's card in play that did damage last turn. Discard that card from play.

cards.name: Banned Item List
effect: Your opponents' cards with a printed Power cost need 1 more Power to play.

cards.name: Beauxbaton's Carriage
effect: When you play this card, you may search your deck for a Witch or Wizard card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.  Before your turn, you may discard this card from play. If you do, until the end of your turn, Character cards require 1 fewer Action to play.

cards.name: Blackboard Ingredients
cards.flavorText: ‘... Snape had turned his back on them to write up the ingredients of today’s potion on the blackboard ...’
effect: Search your deck. You may take up to 3 different Ingredient cards, reveal them, put them in your hand, and then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Blast-Ended Skrewts
cards.flavorText: ‘Ten feet long, it looked more like a giant scorpion than anything.’
effect: When you play this card, do 3 damage to 1 of your Creatures in play.

cards.name: Broom Flying Practice
cards.flavorText: ‘““Hang on, I’ll get my Firebolt.”’ — Harry Potter
effect: Whenever you win a Match by completing it's "To Win," you get 1 more Action this turn.

cards.name: Durmstrang Ship
effect: When you play this card, you may take a non-Healing Wizard or Witch card from your discard pile and put it into your hand.  Before your turn, you may discard this card from play. If you do, choose a non-Healing Character in play and put it on the bottom of its owner's deck.

cards.name: Electric Fireplace
cards.flavorText: ‘“Eclectic, you say? With a plug?”’ — Arthur Weasley
effect: Any player may use an Action to discard an Adventure in play.
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or an opponent's).

cards.name: Favour to Dumbledore
cards.flavorText: ‘“Yeah, I’m staying just the one year ... and then back to my quiet retirement.”’ — Professor Alastor Moody
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your [P] Lessons from play. Search your deck for a Wizard or Witch card and put it into play.

cards.name: Fertiliser from Norway
effect: Your [F] Lessons provide [F][F] instead of [F]. At the end of each of your turns, if you played another non-Lesson card, discard this card or 1 of your [F] Lessons from play.

cards.name: Foe Glass
effect: Opponents cannot use more than 1 Action to play cards during their turn unless you used more than 1 Action during your last turn (even the turn this card leaves play).

cards.name: Gladrags Wizardwear
cards.flavorText: ‘... they had fun selecting the most lurid socks they could find ...’
effect: Whenever a card does damage, it does 2 less damage.
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or an opponent's).

cards.name: Kitchen House Elves
cards.flavorText: ‘Instantly, about six house-elves came trotting up behind him, bearing a large silver tray laden with a teapot ...’
effect: At the end of each of your turns, you may put up to 2 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Krum's Jealousy
cards.flavorText: ‘“I vant to know vot there is between you and Hermy-own-ninny.”’ — Viktor Krum
effect: When you play this card or any player plays a Character, you may choose an opponent. They discard a card from their hand.

cards.name: Madness of Mr. Crouch
cards.flavorText: ‘Mr. Crouch’s eyes were bulging. He stood staring at the tree, muttering soundlessly at it.’
effect: Choose an opponent. They reveal their hand and discard 2 non-Lesson cards from their hand, then take damage equal to the discarded cards' combined printed Power cost.

cards.name: Magical Water Plants of the Mediterranean
effect: During your turn, you may discard this card from play. If you do, remove all damage counters from all of your Creatures.

cards.name: Moody's Eye
effect: Play with the top card of your deck revealed. You may play Spells from the top of your deck as if they were in your hand.

cards.name: Moody's Hip Flask
effect: You may use an Action to discard this card and 1 of your Characters from play. If you do, put a Character from your hand into play.

cards.name: Nightmare
cards.flavorText: ‘Harry lay flat on his back, breathing hard as though he had been running.’
effect: Search your deck. You may choose up to 2 cards from your deck and discard them. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Orchard Pitch
effect: Once during each player's turn, when they use an Action to play a Quidditch card, they may search their deck for a Q Lesson and put it into play, then shuffle their deck.
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or an opponent's).

cards.name: Overhearing a Conversation
cards.flavorText: ‘He seemed so determined that nobody should hear what he was saying ...’
effect: Your opponent can't play Events.
to solve: Your opponent chooses 4 Event cards in their hand and discards them.
reward: Your opponent may put a non-Healing Character card from their discard pile into their hand.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 4 Event cards in their hand and discards them.
cards.reward: Your opponent may put a non-Healing Character card from their discard pile into their hand.

cards.name: Owl Treats
effect: Whenever you play an Owl, you may use that Owl's "When you play this card" ability again.

cards.name: Padfoot's Refuge
effect: The first time a Creature leaves play each turn, their controller may put a non-Advanced Lesson from their discard pile into play.
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or an opponent's).

cards.name: Percy's Admiration
cards.flavorText: ‘“Mr. Crouch!” said Percy breathlessly, sunk into a kind of half-bow that made him look like a hunchback.’
effect: Your opponent cannot play cards with greater printed Power cost than the number of Lessons they have in play.
to solve: Your opponent discards their hand.
reward: Your opponent may put a Lesson from their discard pile into play.
cards.reward: Your opponent may put a Lesson from their discard pile into play.

cards.name: Planetary Divination
effect: Count the number of Divination cards in your discard pile. Look at that many cards on the top of your opponent's deck, then put them back on the top and/or bottom of their deck in any order.

cards.name: Quidditch Teams of Britain and Ireland
effect: When you use an Action to play a Quidditch Spell, you may discard this card from play. If you do, that Spell does 5 more damage.

cards.name: Resurgence of the Dark Mark
cards.flavorText: ‘“Do you see? It’s never been this clear, never since —”’ — Professor Igor Karkaroff
effect: Cards cannot be played from or leave your opponent's discard pile.
to solve: Your opponent skips a total of 5 Actions.
reward: Your opponent may choose 1 of your cards in play and discard it.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent skips a total of 5 Actions.
cards.reward: Your opponent may choose 1 of your cards in play and discard it.

cards.name: Riddle House
cards.flavorText: ‘Once a fine-looking manor ... the Riddle House was now damp, derelict, and unoccupied. ’
effect: Players cannot search their decks.
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or an opponent's).

cards.name: Ron's Jealousy
cards.flavorText: ‘Ron mouthed soundlessly like a goldfish out of water ...’
effect: When you play this card or an opponent draws a card other than during their draw step, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Skeeter's Scoop
effect: When you play this card, secretly write down the name of a non-Lesson card. If an opponent plays that card, you may reveal what you wrote down. If you do, you may search your deck, take any card from your deck and put it into your hand, then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Slanderous Article
cards.flavorText: ‘“The Daily Prophet, however, has unearthed worrying facts about Harry Potter ...”’ — Rita Skeeter
effect: Look at an opponent's hand. Discard all Unique cards from it.

cards.name: Stinging Scar
cards.flavorText: ‘The old scar ... was burning beneath his fingers as though someone had just pressed a white-hot wire to his skin.’
effect: Whenever 1 or more cards leave an opponent's discard pile, do 5 damage to that opponent.

cards.name: Tea with Moody
cards.flavorText: ‘“Why don’t you come up to my office? Come on ... we can have a cup of tea ...”’ — Professor Alastor Moody
effect: Look at the top 6 cards of your deck. You may choose a card from among them and play it without using any Actions. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: The Dark Forces: A Guide to Self Protection
effect: When this card is discarded from play, choose an opponent. They choose 2 cards in their hand and discard them. (If they have fewer than 2 cards in their hand, they discard them all.)

cards.name: The Rise and Fall of the Dark Arts
effect: When you play this card, do 2 damage to yourself. When this card is discarded from play, do 6 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Unplottable
cards.flavorText: ‘“Well, you can enchant a building so it’s impossible to plot on a map, can’t you?”’ — Hermione Granger
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your [P] Lessons from play. Locations cannot leave play. Players cannot play Location cards.

cards.name: Wiggentree Bark
effect: When you play this card, put up to 4 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Wit-Sharpening Potion
effect: Before your turn, if you have Armadillo Bile in play, this card provides [P][P] until the end of the turn; if you have Ginger Root in play, draw a card; and if you have Scarab Beetle in play, do 2 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Wormtail's Torture
cards.flavorText: ‘Wormtail screamed, screamed as though every nerve in his body were on fire ...’
effect: Do 8 damage to yourself. Do 10 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: A Year of No Quidditch
cards.flavorText: ‘“It is also my painful duty to inform you that the Inter-House Quidditch Cup will not take place this year.”’ — Albus Dumbledore
effect: Do 5 damage to an opponent. Your opponents' progress toward winning a Match cannot change until the beginning of your next turn.

cards.name: Aggressive Dustbins
cards.flavorText: ‘“Made one hell of a noise and fired rubbish everywhere ...”’ — Amos Diggory
effect: Before your turn, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do not, Aggressive Dustbins does no damage this turn.

cards.name: Armadillo Bile
effect: The first time you discard a card from your hand or a card you control from play each turn, this card provides [P][P] until the end of the turn.

cards.name: Baby Skrewts
cards.flavorText: ‘They looked like deformed, shell-less lobsters, horribly pale and slimy-looking, with legs sticking out in very odd places and no visible heads.’
effect: When you play this card, choose 1 of your Creatures in play. Do 2 damage to it.

cards.name: Bubotubers
cards.flavorText: ‘“They need squeezing. You will collect the pus —”’ — Professor Pomona Sprout
effect: When you play this card, you may put up to 2 non-Healing cards from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Bubotuber Pus
effect: You may use an Action to discard this card from play. If you do, shuffle up to 4 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Canary Creams
cards.flavorText: ‘Just then, Neville caused a slight diversion by turning into a large canary.’
effect: Choose an opponent. On their next turn, their first card they play requires 1 more Power to play. Then draw a card.

cards.name: Defensive Flying
effect: Whenever you take damage, you may discard any number of cards from your hand. If you do, prevent twice that much damage.

cards.name: Demonstration Spiders
cards.flavorText: ‘Moody jerked his wand, and the spider rose onto two of its hind legs and went into what was unmistakably a tap dance’
effect: Whenever an opponent plays a Spell, put 1 damage counter on this card.

cards.name: Disturbed and Dangerous
cards.flavorText: ‘“I told you! I told you not to annoy Rita Skeeter!”’ — Ron Weasley
effect: Name a non-Lesson card. For every card of that name an opponent has in their discard pile, they take 2 damage.

cards.name: Eagle Owl
effect: When you play this card, you may put a non-Healing Event card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Empty Pitch
cards.flavorText: ‘“Don’t worry, you’ll have your Quidditch field back to normal once the task is over!”’ — Ludo Bagman
effect: Whenever a player uses an Action to play a Lesson, they may discard a card from their hand. If they do, they draw a card.
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or an opponent's).

cards.name: Enchanted Tables
cards.flavorText: ‘Bill’s table caught Charlie’s with a huge bang and knocked one of its legs off.’
effect: Do 5 damage to an opponent. If you have at least 3 Items in play, instead do 9 damage to them.

cards.name: Enough Stamps
cards.flavorText: ‘“The postman noticed,” he said with gritted teeth. “Very interested to know where this letter came from, he was.”’
effect: Do 3 damage to an opponent or to a Creature of your choice. Do 3 damage to an opponent or to a Creature of your choice. Then draw 2 card.

cards.name: Fake Predictions
cards.flavorText: ‘“Aaaaah, when two Neptunes appear in the sky, it is a sure sign that a midget in glasses is being born ...”’ — Ron Weasley
effect: Do 1 damage to yourself. Choose an opponent. They choose 1 of their cards in play and discard it.

cards.name: Fire Crabs
effect: The first time this card takes damage each turn, do 3 damage to each player.

cards.name: Fizzing Whisbees
cards.flavorText: ... Fizzing Whizzbees, the levitating sherbet balls that Ron had mentioned ...'
effect: Do 3 damage to an opponent. Then draw a card.

cards.name: Flobberworm Mucus
effect: You may use an Action to discard this card and Wiggentree Bark from play to search your deck. You may take a Wiggenweld Potion card from your deck and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Forced Diet
cards.flavorText: ‘“My aunt found him smuggling doughnuts into his room yesterday.”’ — Harry Potter
effect: Your opponents cannot play Candy cards.

cards.name: Ginger Root
effect: The first time you discard a card from your hand or a card you control from play each turn, draw a card.

cards.name: Gobstones
cards.flavorText: ‘... a wizarding game rather like marbles ...’
effect: to win: Before your turn, have at least 6 different card types in play.
prize: Choose an opponent's card in play and return it to its owner's hand. Then do 3 damage to that opponent.
cards.toWin: Before your turn, have at least 6 different card types in play.
cards.prize: Choose an opponent's card in play and return it to its owner's hand. Then do 3 damage to that opponent.

cards.name: Head in the Fire
cards.flavorText: ‘Amos Diggory’s head was sitting in the middle of the flames like a large, bearded egg.’
effect: Choose an opponent's Advanced Lesson in play and discard it.

cards.name: Hermione's Meditation
cards.flavorText: ‘“You miss him!” Hermione said impatiently. “And I know he misses you —”’
effect: Choose an opponent's Adventure in play. You get the reward.

cards.name: House-elf Exploitation
effect: Do 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of Creatures. If you have an [F] Lesson in play, you may choose a Creature in play and remove all damage counters from it.

cards.name: Impedimenta!
cards.flavorText: ‘“Should slow down anything that’s trying to attack you ...”’ — Hermione Granger
effect: Choose an opponent. During their next turn, they get 1 fewer Action and they can't draw cards except during their draw step.

cards.name: Ingredient Preparation
cards.flavorText: He swept around in his long black cloak, watching them weigh dried nettles and crush snake fangs ...
effect: Do 2 damage to an opponent or to a Creature of your choice. You may discard a card from your hand to do 2 damage to an opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

cards.name: Laps around Hogwarts
effect: Do 4 damage to an opponent. You may put a [Q] Lesson from your hand into play.

cards.name: Moody Borrows the Map
cards.flavorText: ‘“I can make good use of this ... this might be exactly what I’ve been looking for ...”’ — Professor Alastor Moody
effect: Choose an Item or Event in play and discard it.

cards.name: Normal Clothes
effect: Once per turn, you may prevent 1 damage done to you.

cards.name: Off-Season Training
effect: Count the number of [Q] Lessons you have in play, then draw that many cards.

cards.name: Padfoot Returns
cards.flavorText: ‘“I want to be on the spot. Your last letter ... well, let’s just say things are getting fishier.”’ — Sirius Black
effect: Put a non-Healing Character card from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Report of Cauldron Thickness
cards.flavorText: ‘He wasn’t looking forward to being lectured on cauldron bottoms all through dinner.’
effect: Do 4 damage to an opponent. During that opponent's next turn, they may not use Actions to play Item cards.

cards.name: Resentful Goodbye
effect: Choose an opponent's Lesson in play and discard it. Then search your deck. You may take a Lesson card from your deck, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: S.P.E.W. Button
effect: When you play this card, draw a card.  When any of your cards are discarded from play, you may discard this card. If you do, draw a card.

cards.name: Scarab Beetle
cards.flavorText: Harry continued to pound his scarab beetles...'
effect: The first time you discard a card from your hand or a card you control from play each turn, you may do 1 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Seeing the Unseen
cards.flavorText: ‘Harry’s heart gave a horrible jolt. Moody could see through Invisibility Cloaks ...’
effect: Choose an opponent's card in play and return it to its owner's hand. That opponent reveals their hand. Choose up to 2 cards in their hand and discard them.

cards.name: Snowy Owl
effect: When you play this card, you may discard 1 of your [F] Lessons from play. If you do, you may choose a Location card from your discard pile and put it into your hand.

cards.name: Squid Tentacles
cards.flavorText: ‘“... something in the water grabbed me and pushed me back in the boat!”’ — Dennis Creevey
effect: When you play this card or when this card is discarded from play, you may put a [P] Lesson from your hand or discard pile into play.

cards.name: Sugar-Free Candy
cards.flavorText: Hermione's parents were dentists.'
effect: You may choose one of your cards in play and discard it. Draw a card.  (Sugar-Free Candy isn't really a Candy.)

cards.name: The Standard Book of Spells, Grade 4
effect: When you play this card, you may put a non-Advanced Lesson from your discard pile into play.

cards.name: Tickled Pear
cards.flavorText: ‘It began to squirm, chuckling, and suddenly turned into a large green door handle.’
effect: Choose up to 5 non-Healing cards in your discard pile and shuffle them into your deck. If you have a [C] Lesson in play, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Ton-Tongue Toffee
cards.flavorText: ‘“It was four feet long before his parents would let me shrink it!”’ — Arthur Weasley
effect: Until your next turn, opponents cannot use Actions to play Adventures. Draw a card.

cards.name: Tresspasser in the Riddle House
cards.flavorText: ‘Standing at the sink, filling the kettle, he looked up at the Riddle House and saw lights glimmering in its upper windows.’
effect: Do 4 damage to yourself. Choose an opponent's card in play and return it to their hand.

cards.name: Tropical Birds
cards.flavorText: ‘Hedwig had not approved of these flashy intruders ...’
effect: Before each of your turns, choose a Lesson type. This card provides 1 Power of that type until the end of your turn.

cards.name: Turbulent Flight
cards.flavorText: ‘Full of fresh determination, he urged his broom through the turbulent air ...’
effect: Do 4 damage to an opponent. If you have a [T] Lesson in play, choose a card type. That opponent chooses a card of that type they control and discards it.

cards.name: Wheezes Order Form
effect: Whenever you play a Spell, you may put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Weekly Zoological Column
effect: Whenever you play a Creature card, you may reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. You may put a Lesson card from among them into play, then discard the rest.

cards.name: Alchemy, Third Year
effect: Before your turn, discard this card from play. If you do, you may search your deck for a [P] or [T] Lesson and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Astronomy, Third Year
effect: Before your turn, discard this card from play. If you do, you may search your deck for a [Q] or [T] Lesson and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Defense Against the Dark Arts, Third Year
effect: Before your turn, discard this card from play. If you do, you may search your deck for a [F] or [C] Lesson and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Divinatino, Third Year
effect: Before your turn, discard this card from play. If you do, you may search your deck for a [C] or [P] Lesson and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Flying, Third Year
effect: Before your turn, discard this card from play. If you do, you may search your deck for a [F] or [Q] Lesson and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.
